title: Azure
description: Microsoft Azure cloud platform services and architecture

subpaths.title: API Management
subpaths.description: Manage, secure, and publish APIs with Azure API Management.

subpaths.title: Azure Cosmos DB
subpaths.description: Globally distributed NoSQL database service with multi-model support and high scalability.

subpaths.title: Azure Event Hub
subpaths.description: Foundational concepts of Azure Event Hub for big data streaming, including event producers, partitions, consumer groups, and throughput units.

subpaths.title: Azure Event Grid
subpaths.description: Understanding Azure Event Grid for reactive event-driven architecture, including event sources, handlers, filters, and delivery.

subpaths.title: Azure SQL Database
subpaths.description: Getting started with Azure SQL including provisioning, querying, scaling, and configuring performance and security features.

subpaths.title: Azure Redis Cache
subpaths.description: Core concepts of Azure Redis Cache for high-speed data access, including caching strategies, keys, expiration, and performance tuning.

subpaths.title: Azure Service Bus
subpaths.description: Introduction to Azure Service Bus, focusing on queues, topics, message delivery patterns, and enterprise messaging solutions.

subpaths.title: Azure App Configuration
subpaths.description: Introduction to Azure App Configuration for centralized management of application settings and feature flags across environments.

subpaths.title: Azure Active Directory (AAD)
subpaths.description: Identity and access management service for managing users, groups, and access to resources.

subpaths.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
subpaths.description: Managed Kubernetes service in Azure for running containerized applications at scale.

subpaths.title: Azure Managed Identity
subpaths.description: Provides Azure services with an automatically managed identity for secure authentication to other services.

title: Authentication and Authorization
description: Understand identity management, authentication flows, and access control in cloud-native applications, including OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, and role-based access.

subpaths.title: OIDC vs OAuth
subpaths.description: Compare OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0, exploring their roles in authentication and authorization, key differences, and common use cases.

subpaths.description: Study electronic components, amplifiers, diodes, and transistors to understand circuit design and behavior.

subpaths.title: Digital Communication

subpaths.title: Embedded Systems
subpaths.description: Explore microcontrollers, interfacing, and real-time operating systems used in modern electronics.

description: Master programming close to the hardware using C and C++, understanding memory, pointers, and system-level concepts.
